Tyrannosaurus

Time Period
Diet
Carnnivore

The tyrannosaurus is the most fierce of all dinosaurs!

The tyrannosaurus lived during the Late Cretaceous Period

Features

  • Big teeth
  • Little arms
  • Thick tail
